Record.Term: Autologous EBV-Transformed B Lymphoblastoid-Tumor Fusion Cell Vaccine
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Antineoplastic Vaccine/Autologous EBV-Transformed B Lymphoblastoid-Tumor Fusion Cell Vaccine
Record.BroaderTerm: Autologous EBV-Transformed B Lymphoblastoid-Tumor Fusion Cell Vaccine
Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Synonym: Autologous EBV-Transformed B Lymphoblastoid-Tumor Fusion Cell Vaccine
Record.Description: A cell-based vaccine composed of autologous tumor cells fused with Epstein-Barr virus-transformed B-lymphoblastoid cells. Upon administration, this vaccine may stimulate a cytotoxic T cell response against tumor cells, resulting in tumor cell lysis. (NCI05)
